Trigger.Name: 各种时间的水分摊Dark Water III
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:(?<id>1[0-9A-F]{7}):(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Dark Water III|ディレイスペル：ダークウォタガ|延迟咏唱：黑暗狂水) from [\w ]? for (?<timer>[\d]{1,2})\.\w+ Seconds\.
